title: Chairwoman Johnson Applauds EPA Decision to Ban Chlorpyrifos on Food
summary: (Washington, DC) - Today, the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) announced a ban on the use of chlorpyrifos on food. Chlorpyrifos is an agricultural pesticide that has been found to be neurotoxic to children and developing fetuses.
